page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LOUISE
page.content: I get up in the morning and have my breakfast and then my sister goes off to catch her school bus.Sometimes my Mum leaves the house with me to go to work and sometimes I walk to school on my own.It is my job to unlock the many doors of our school building.I also have to unlock some gates in the playground.After our assembly we have our first lessons.Usually in the morning we have number work and English and French.In the afternoon we have Topic work,Games,Art and Craft and Music.At playtimes I usually play with Tracy and we play dancing games or we practise netball.At lunchtime we all have sandwiches and then have our long playtime.At 3.30 school finishes and I go home.I play with my sister and we go to the village shop to get some shopping for my Mum.After I have watched T.V.I go to bed at 8.30.
